body.name: Yak About It Mini Fridge Dorm Station - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 16 - 21. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins.
features: Provides additional storage space over and around your compact mini fridge
Durable, easy to put together organizer for your college kitchen supplies or office break room
Compact size - great for small dorm rooms or off campus apartments
Keep your snacks, drinks, plates, mini fridge, microwave and more in one convenient spot
Overall Dimensions: 33.75"W x 22"D x 37"H, Fridge Opening: 19.50"W x 22"D x 36.50"H
body.description: Yak About It Mini Fridge Dorm Station College dorm rooms are infamously small, and clutter and disorganization can happen quickly if you don’t make use of durable space saving storage solutions for all of your college supplies. Bringing additional shelving is a smart way to make enough space for your personal belongings. The Yak About It Mini Fridge Dorm Station in Black is specially designed to add extra shelving to provide high quality college storage that you need for all of your dorm supplies! With two side dorm shelving compartments, this inexpensive college storage unit can store all of your college essentials. Plus, the compact size of this sturdy wooden shelf means that it has a small impact and will easily blend in with the rest of your dorm decor. While you’re checking off college items on your dorm supplies checklist, don't forget about essential storage like the Yak About It Mini Fridge Dorm Station!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yak About It Mini Fridge Dorm Station College dorm rooms are infamously small, and clutter and disorganization can happen quickly if you don’t make use of durable space saving storage solutions for all of your college supplies. Bringing additional shelving is a smart way to make enough space for your personal belongings. The Yak About It Mini Fridge Dorm Station in Black is specially designed to add extra shelving to provide high quality college storage that you need for all of your dorm supplies! With two side dorm shelving compartments, this inexpensive college storage unit can store all of your college essentials. Plus, the compact size of this sturdy wooden shelf means that it has a small impact and will easily blend in with the rest of your dorm decor. While you’re checking off college items on your dorm supplies checklist, don't forget about essential storage like the Yak About It Mini Fridge Dorm Station! Yak About It Wooden Furniture We offer shelving, organizers, and lockable storage in many designs to expand your storage options. Each product is compact, affordable, and durable to suit your hectic college lifestyle. This convenient line of dorm products completes your dorm room décor for a sleek and modern style.

Simple DIY Assembly No more struggling with confusing assembly instructions—you can assemble low cost Yak About It wooden furniture with just an included screwdriver! High quality wooden materials fit together for DIY shelving that's sturdy and looks great, even if you're on a budget. Personalized Dorm Storage Yak About It products are constructed to easily fit and stack together so you can design your own dream DIY college storage solutions! Inexpensive mix and match dorm storage is a smart way to make the most out of your space and keep your personal belongings decluttered. Durable Wood Shelving Designed in the USA, Yak About It dorm organization shelving is made of wood instead of plastic for a sturdier feel. These wooden mini fridge organizer shelves are made to be reliable and secure, so you can feel confident about storing your college essentials on these dorm organizers.
Useful Furniture Dimensions Overall: 33.75"L x 22"D x 37"H Bottom Cubby: 11.75"L x 22"D x 22.75"H Top Cubby: 11.75"L x 22"D x 11.75"H Fridge Opening: 19.5"L x 22"D x 36.5"H

DormCo - The Leader in College Dorm Essentials DormCo is an American owned corporation that creates innovative dorm essential brands and small space living products. Starting in 2010, with a 4,000 sq. ft. warehouse, Dorm Company has grown to over 130,000 sq. ft. of warehouse space in Nashville, TN (Madison and Gallatin, TN locations). For over 12 years, DormCo has helped students (and their parents) realize the excitement of leaving home and starting their freshman year of college DormCo's trustworthy and quality products can provide everything you need to make your transition seamless and comfortable with Twin XL bedding (Byourbed brand), trunks, seating, organizers, decor, and more. Moving from home to college is a time you'll always remember and you need a wide selection of reliable and useful products that create a home within a college dorm. Not in college, but love our products? Not a problem! Whether you're buying for a home, apartment, or office, our products transcend college dorms and can be used in a number of locations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After weeks of searching dimensions ...
reviews.reviewText: We must have looked at hundreds, thousands for the fit -real furniture and kits like this. Frig sizes are different. The frig that goes in the hole is taller than typical. Finally, this one looked like a fit. We didn't find an off-shelf assembled unit. I offered to build one from scratch months ago, and my wife said no. Admittedly, I have a significant backlog of partially complete house jobs.First, I hate assembling this stuff. It's easy. I've put dozens together over the years and three this year. This one takes a bit over an hour from box to finish. Too much time is spent understanding the instructions.The instructions here are pretty good. All the holes were drilled. It came with all the parts. That hasn't happened in the last 3 I've moaningly put together and needed to DIY elements. I've done enough to be sure I don't like putting them together.Anyway, it's finished now. It's sturdy. It's what I would have expected. It's suitable for a few years when we'll decide on something else.Comparably good kit. All good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together!!!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together. Similar to how IKEA designs their furniture. A screwdriver was supplied but broke. Can be a bit wobbly but it’s nothing major. Definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars vinyl already cracking off of wood, Box came destroyed. :/
reviews.reviewText: put the items together and put one side on and saw the vinyl was already cracking off , too expensive to return . They sent the pieces that were peeling in a refund order but the package came destroyed yet again , not even a month with this item and the vinyl is absolutely peeling off of all sides. Hoping they send a new one that isn't already peeling. :/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for something that looked like it was built for a mini fridge, that wouldn't stand out in my room, all I kept seeing were the metal stands. That would not look nice in my bedroom. This unit looks so much better.It is taller than I would like but I'll take this over those metal stands.It arrived quickly, no scratches or dents, nothing missing. My sons put this together while I was at work. Might have taken them about an hour or less to put together but, I'm not sure.I am quite pleased with this unit. I now have proper storage for the mini fridge items and other things I used to stack on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Size Cabinet
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cabinet for my wine cooler in my sitting area. I didn't want it to look like it belonged in a dorm, so I put a door on it and covered the top with peel & stick paper. It looks totally different from the original cabinet. It's wobbly until you put the back on it. Now it's very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product but kinda expensive
reviews.reviewText: The product is great, but for what it is and material it is made of, $150 is pricey. I think it's a great piece to help storage with the mini fridge but $150 & supposed to be for a college dorm is pricey for having to build it yourself and it's just cubbies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars There's better products out there
reviews.reviewText: Extremely cheap construction. Instructions were extremly vague. The screwdriver included broke. A hammer would have been useful but not necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great addition to my mancave! Very easy to put together, instructions were easy to understand. Very sturdy!
